Name: Indian Rose
Ingredients: 7.5 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of edible rose petal..
Garnish with rose petal floated on cocktail.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2005 at Mie N Yu, Washington D.C..
Nutrition: One serving of Indian Rose contains 202 calories
